snippet: The competition among sports seeking a spot in the Olympics is expensive — and can last for years.
abstract: Companion piece to Business page one story about sports vying for inclusion in 2020 Olympics notes that stiff competition among sports seeking a spot in the Olympics is expensive--and can last for years.
lead_paragraph: The competition among sports seeking a spot in the Olympics is expensive — and can last for years.

headline.main: A Big Bet on an Olympic Jackpot
headline.print_headline: A Long, Expensive Bet on a Big Jackpot
